Text.Page:
Expanding markets means expanding profits. We need you to do a little market research, .

Find Tryphena at a camp near Azarel's Labyrinth and ask her about "market opportunities." She'll know what you mean.

You're one of Jax's people, aren't you?

Tell them I've noticed a lot of traffic in this area, and some of it has a high value/risk ratio. They'll know what I mean.

High value/risk ratio, she said?

Take this token of our appreciation, and remember: market research can be lucrative.
